Reviews.Title: Does all it says very well
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little unit if the description fits what you're looking for.  The extension portions works very well - there are several smaller extenders which can be mixed and matched to find the right length.It comes both with a pedestal that can also be screwed into the wall, and a special clip that will allow it to be connected to ceiling tile beams without any permanent wholes.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Universal Camera Mount
Reviews.Author: Samuel
Reviews.Content: Product was excellent, strong, all metal , sturdy and I would recommend this product.  Product is very durable!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Surprise
Reviews.Author: Robb
Reviews.Content: I bought 8 of these to replace the junk that came with my Zmodo cameras. These are pretty solid and fit the bill perfectly. Having the ones that came with the cameras to compare with these really helped me determine how nice these were. The swivel that adjusts where the camera mounts is solid and thick. The guy who installed my cameras bent the crap out of the brand new Zmodo brackets during the install. That was just so they would stay steady. The next day I ordered these and replaced all 8 of the junk original ones. I'm not sure why a company like Zmodo won't included brackets like these? It would sure make you feel better about what you are buying. We all say the same thing don't we? Cheap Chinese Crap. Well these are cheap price wise but they are not crap. I'm not saying these are the best brackets money can buy but I am saying they ARE worth the money you spend to buy them. I rather pay an extra $25 to Zmodo and have them send these with the cameras they sell then the paper thin crap they include now.....Plus I would not have to follow the installer around replacing brand new junk brackets the next day. That's just my 2 cents. I hope you enjoy them as much as I did.Robb

Reviews.Title: To fix the non-tightening ball head
Reviews.Author: Dean Brown
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of these. They are really nice quality, except for the ball head. In my case, ALL 4 of them did NOT lock when I tightened the thumb screw. But I fixed them all by grinding the thumb screw threaded bolts down into slightly pointed shapes. The bolt then does its thing pushing the side of the fixture up and towards the ball, locking it.The end of the bolt should be shaped a bit like a blunt pencil, rather than the flat end of the pencil as it comes.EDIT: I changed my mind - the ball heads are just plain junk. I stripped off the thread of the two that I actually tried to use, thus rendering them useless. Cheap enough to be used for extensions, but I would say these is a truly bad design, made in China trash.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good mounts
Reviews.Author: Bill James "Bill"
Reviews.Content: I do like these mounts, I used them to replace the cheap ones that come with Foscam outdoor cameras and they work well for that application

Reviews.Title: Good product for light weight cams
Reviews.Author: gsquare
Reviews.Content: I have used these in the past and they are sufficient for light weight cameras.  Would not put a brick cam on them however.  The adjustable extenders allow for customizing the cam install.

Reviews.Title: Price is in line w/ the quality
Reviews.Author: Robert Hillyard "Rob - just Rob"
Reviews.Content: Eh. Of the 6 ordered, 1 was defective. Not anything you'd want to use for anything but the lightest of cameras.

Reviews.Title: Work well and ez to paint
Reviews.Author: FLDonna
Reviews.Content: I replaced several old, rusted camera mounts with these.  They are high quality, easy to paint, and easy to mount and configure and much better than the cheapo mounting brackets that come with most security cameras.

Reviews.Title: Back to Basics
Reviews.Author: W. E. Slater-lunsford "WayneSL"
Reviews.Content: These little camera holders are simple, well-made and very adaptable thanks to the extra parts in the kit.  A great deal for a simple, useful product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the job
Reviews.Author: Tim F
Reviews.Content: I have a cheap home surveillance system and needed to rehang some cameras.  Over time, the original ball adjustments got warped (perhaps due to the hot Vegas summer temps) and I needed replacements.  These handled the job nicely and for the right price.

Reviews.Title: Great mount
Reviews.Author: Louie D "Louie D"
Reviews.Content: This mount is solid and well worth the price.  It is much better than the mounts that come with most cameras.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: W. Huggins "Wayne"
Reviews.Content: Bracket works,but doesn't hold camera very well. Feels like it might strip the threads if I try to tighten it more.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: M. Armenta "Matt"
Reviews.Content: !!!!!!!!!! The worst mount i have ever used !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!the mount will not stay in placespend the money for a good mount

Reviews.Title: Does Not Lock In Position
Reviews.Author: Serenity
Reviews.Content: The finger lock which is supposed to tighten to hold the camera is place does not lock down tight enough to prevent a camera from tipping even when the camera is evenly balanced.  If the camera is pointed down in front, it will not stay in that position.

Reviews.Title: I disregarded the negative reviews and paid the price
Reviews.Author: Jim "Just Jim"
Reviews.Content: The bracket is simply terrible. There is no way to tighten the thumb screw to stop the camera from flopping around. If you tighten the screw a little too hard you will only strip the threads for the screw. My optimistic nature led me astray on this purchase. I received a better bracket for free with my camera. I will be returning these.

Reviews.Title: Too light and not tight
Reviews.Author: Kevin "kvn"
Reviews.Content: These brackets won't keep any camera of any weight secure as the one thumb-screw fastener must perform two different purposes. My needs were for cameras that needed to be held tight and these fasteners wouldn't do it.  As technology gets lighter and smaller, there may be some service these could provide for you BUT, just know that these are very light weight with many moving parts that don't want to stay snug.
